mapper.insert: insert into recommend (rcseq,rctitle,rccontent,rcphoto,email, rctime ,rclike) values (RCSEQ_RCOMMEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{rctitle}, #{rccontent}, #{rcphoto}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTIMESTAMP , 0)
mapper.select: select m.name,r.rcseq,r.rctitle,r.rctime,r.rclike from member m join recommend r on m.email = r.email
